Replace.Text: Z23, your diligence and conscientiousness are your greatest assets. In the Battle of the Bay of Biscay, your valor was enough to highlight your fearless courage. As an Iron Blood honor student, your excellence is unmatched. Study hard and reach for the top of your game! You will write your own legend, and the Iron Blood will be celebrated for generations to come.
Let's learn together and work our way to the top together.
Z23 will utilize her [ICON_TECHBOOSTED] Eureka and [ICON_CIVICBOOSTED] Inspiration and Army to defeat her enemies.

Unlike other leaders, Z23 will gain additional [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture based on her Technology and Civic spending when she triggers [ICON_TECHBOOSTED] Eureka and [ICON_CIVICBOOSTED] Inspiration. This means that Z23 can gain technological and municipal advantages by flexing the order in which she researches Technologies and Civics, and she can advance her current Technologies or Civics by triggering [ICON_TECHBOOSTED] Eureka or [ICON_CIVICBOOSTED] Inspiration from the back of the line. Of course, Z23 also has an excellent army: they have higher [ICON_MOVEMENT] mobility and gain [ICON_Strength] combat bonuses when in enemy territory. Don't worry even if they're heavily outnumbered, turning on a military unit's Destruction Mode in enemy District will restore the unit's life and briefly increase its [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength, which is enough to take down any enemy in one fell swoop.

The Z23 was the first ship of the Nazi German Navy's Z-wing 1936A class, which consisted of 15 ships including the 1936A and was also known as the Narvik class. The biggest improvement of the Z23 was the larger caliber of the main gun, from 127mm to 150mm. Other than that, there was not much change compared to the Z-drive up to 1936. Starting with the Z23, the Z-drive was no longer named after the German Navy soldiers who died in WWI, but was simply named after the type.

She was laid down on January 15, 1938, launched on September 20, 1939, and commissioned on September 14, 1940; she suffered great damage from air raids on August 12, 1944, and was decommissioned on August 21 of the same year.
Honor Student
Focus on [ICON_SCIENCE] Science as much as possible. Prefers civilizations that also focus on [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and dislikes civilizations that lag behind in [ICON_SCIENCE] Science.
Z23 likes civilizations that focus on [ICON_SCIENCE] Science
(You have a higher Science)
You are behind in [ICON_SCIENCE] Science and Z23 is disappointing
(You're behind in Science)
Iron Blood Vanguard

When triggering [ICON_TECHBOOSTED] Eureka for a Technology or [ICON_CIVICBOOSTED] Inspiration for a Civic, you gain [ICON_SCIENCE] Science or [ICON_CULTURE] Culture equal to 15% of the cost of that Technology or Civic. +1 [ICON_MOVEMENT] Movement for all military units, +7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when in enemy territory. Allow military units to be in "Destruction Mode". Gain the Type 1936A Destroyer unique unit when the Combined Arms technology is researched.
Type 1936A Destroyer
Z23's unique Atomic era naval unit that replaces the Destroyer, can carry out a range of 2 long range attack. Reveals Naval Raiders within sight range.
The Type 1936A destroyer, also known as the Z-23 class, was known to the Allies as the Narvik destroyer along with the wartime Type 1936A (Mob). Total 15 ships.

Since the completion of the design and construction of the Type 1936 destroyer, the next stage of the German design work in two directions: 1, for the Baltic Sea and the North Sea of small destroyers, standard displacement of 1,500 tons, speed of 40 knots, and the British destroyer is similar to; 2, for the Atlantic Ocean, a large ocean-going destroyer, which is the Type 1937 destroyer, whose standard displacement is more than 3,700 tons, and the fully loaded Its standard displacement was more than 3,700 tons, and its full load displacement was close to 5,000 tons, which was a kind of mini cruiser. However, the development of the Type 1937 encountered difficulties and was criticized for its protection, firepower, speed and range, which were not commensurate with its large tonnage. In April 1938, the development of the Type 1937 destroyer was halted, and the designers were asked to develop a general-purpose fleet destroyer on the basis of the successful Type 1936 destroyer on a similar line of thought, which became the Type 1936A destroyer. This became the Type 1936A destroyer.

The most distinctive feature of this class of destroyers was the use of a light cruiser class 150mm caliber main gun, the Tbts KC/36 or Tbts KC/36T, 48x. The main reason for this was to gain an advantage over the French super destroyers with 138.6mm caliber guns. The main reason for this was the desire to gain an advantage over the French super-destroyers, which were armed with 138.6mm guns. 5 150mm guns were arranged in the form of 1 twin turret + 3 single mounted turrets, although the development of the twin turrets had not yet been completed, and delays in their production meant that they could only be fitted with single mounted turrets where the twin turrets would have been, when they were completed. After 1942, with the exception of Z26 and Z30, the ships were fitted with twin turrets one at a time. One of them, Z-28, was designed as a commander's destroyer, with a deckhouse aft for staff officers, and four 150mm guns mounted on four single-mounted turrets, in a two forward and two aft configuration.

Between November 1938 and April 1940, eight Type 1936A destroyers (Z23-Z30) were built, and from September 1940, the Type 1936A (Mob), meaning "Mobilmachung" (mobilized), or wartime mobilized destroyer, was built. The Mob underwent some minor changes, mainly to the internal layout, some improvements to the power plant, a raised bow turret collar, and a larger chimney cap. 12 Mob ships were planned, Z31-Z42, but 7 were completed (Z31-Z34, Z37-Z39), Z35 and Z36 were moved to 1936B (Mob), Z40-Z42 were moved to 1938A, and Z40-Z42 were moved to 1938B (Mob). Z42 were moved to Type 1938A.

The 150mm main gun greatly enhanced the firepower of this class, and further increased the ship's size and displacement to over 3,500 tons full load, but there were still problems with seakeeping and stability, with the ship's bow being heavily surfed, and the ship swaying heavily in the wind and waves. Later designs reverted to the 128mm main gun of the former type, the 1936B (Mob). The development of a new type of destroyer with a new 128mm anti-aircraft gun, the Type 1936C, was also started.
Iron Blood Vanguard
+1 [ICON_MOVEMENT] Movement, +7 when in enemy territory [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength
+{1_Amount} [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when in enemy territory
Destruction Mode + {1_Amount} [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength
+{Property} [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength due to looted Districts and Buildings
"Destruction mode"
Destruction Mode

The unit heals {1_num} HP, +2 [ICON_Strength] Movement, +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength and regains all [ICON_Movement] Movement and attack capability for the turn. If the unit is on an enemy District, it will also loot the District and all buildings in it and gain an additional [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength bonus. Requires {2_num} {2_num : plural 1?turn; other?turns;} cooldown.
Uh-huh. Let's work together!
I'm going to study. Can you leave me alone?
The road to the top is often hard and long, and even the strongest person is inevitably lonely. So, I want to be friends with you yet...
Well, let's learn together and move to the top together!
Looks like there's a lot to review just now...
War? Well, Z23, the time has come to test the fruits of that effort!
Your attitude towards the world is too perfunctory. Life must not be so wasted. It is necessary to supervise you properly!
Your delegation has arrived safely. Rest assured that the feast at which they were entertained was not overloaded with chili peppers.
Unfortunately, I have a lot to do today.
Please accept my delegation! They bring good potatoes and sausages and my goodwill.
Such denigration cannot be avoided on the road to the top.
How in the world can there be people who don't take themselves so seriously? (Denounces you)

I'm the first ship of the Type 1936A destroyer, Z23, and all the sisters from me onward only have code names, unlike my sisters who have inherited the names of their predecessors. It's a bit impersonal but it's really convenient, so please don't be polite and just call me Z23.
Want to visit a city near us? I'll show you the unique culture that belongs to Iron Blood, and I'll also show you how to taste potatoes prepared in various ways.
Thank you, this will facilitate communication between us.
I would love to learn about your country and I will tell you about mine. Let's start with the capital!
There's so much to do today.
The backdrop of your efforts and achievements make me long for them. I hope to progress with you.
More than anything else, you might as well read more.
Let's make an alliance and climb to the top together!
Peace is a good choice. Let's call a truce!
No, this ordeal is not over!
This war has deviated from its original purpose. Let's shake hands and make peace.
I'm happy to open the borders for you. The Iron Blood should not be a closed country.
I'm sorry, but we have important business to attend to in the Iron Blood today.
Care to open your borders for us?
What do you want with your army sneaking around the Iron Blood duchy? I'm not the kind of girl who can just muddle through. Oh, please withdraw your troops as soon as possible.
I'm sorry to cause you concern, but you can't order me around.
I will remove the troops from the perimeter of your territory as quickly as possible, don't worry.
LOL, looks like not enough preparation ...... You win.
I don't think that's a good deal.
Uh-huh, I agree.
